#summary How to install the Eclipse Ganymede devolpment platform

= Introduction =

[www.eclipse.org/ Eclipse]is an open source community whose projects are focus on building an extensible development platform, runtimes and application frameworks for building, deploying and managing software across the entire software lifecycle.

= Details =

Installing eclipse and CDT
 # Download 'eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-win32.zip' from the eclipse website at http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
 # Extract the files from the archive into a new folder called eclipse and copy that folder to C:\
 # Run the Eclipse executable from the folder and when asked for a workspace set it to C:\eclipse\workspace
 # You must then point the eclipse download manager to CDT, which will allow you to compile and execute c++ code.  This is done from eclipse by selecting Help->Software Updates->Find and Install.
 # Click the 'New Remote Siteâ€¦' button
 # Enter 'CDT' as the name and then enter the following as the url: 'http://download.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/releases/callisto' 
 # Click 'ok' and then click finish.  Eclipse will now download updates to CDT automatically
 # Open the C/C++ perspective by clicking Window->Open Perspective->Other->C/C++
